experiences.title: Student, FreeLancer
experiences.details: Working towards increasing and harnessing well my growing enterprise system skills, more involvement in open source projects and facilitating projects and researches .Creating Mobile Applications and Web solutions for clients on online Platforms

experiences.title: Master the Mainframe Contest Winner 2018
experiences.details: Was a Regional winner in Master the Mainframe Contest (2018) for Africa and Middle East, a programming contest offered by IBM.

experiences.title: Master the Mainframe practical Experience Badge
experiences.details: I earned a badge on the ability to innovate on the mainframe by solving real life situations encountered by experienced systems programmers.I demonstrated programming skills (advanced commands system navigation) and ability to develop application tasks (C, JAVA, COBOL, assembler and REXX), all on the z/OS platform

experiences.title: Master the Mainframe Real world Challenges Badge
experiences.details: I earned a badge for mastering basic mainframe concepts,perform programming (advanced commands, system setup, and advanced system navigation) and application developing tasks(C, JAVA, COBOL, assembler and REXX) all on the z/OS platform
